articles.title: Trump admin considers exempting Christians from its push to deport some Afghan refugees - Politico
articles.description: The push is unlikely to help Muslim Afghans, including those who helped American troops and civilians, who could also face dire consequences if they return to the country.

articles.title: Trump Says He Wouldn’t ‘100 Percent’ Agree America Should Be Ruled by Laws, Not Men - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Donald Trump said in a wide-ranging interview with Time that he isn't "100 percent" in agreement that the United State is a nation of laws, not men.

articles.title: Big brands are officially worried about American shoppers - NPR
articles.description: Makers of our food and home essentials, including Pepsi and Procter & Gamble, are cutting their financial forecasts for the year and predicting lower sales or profits than before.
articles.content:
The companies that make our food and home essentials are officially sounding alarms about what lies ahead for the U.S. shopper.
